page.title: 16Where I live.
page.content:
My house is a terraced house.We use to have a toilet outside, but we have got a toilet inside now.We have two bedrooms one for me and one for my mum and dad.I have to go through my mum's bedroom to get to the toilet from my room. We eat in the backroom because the table is in there.We have got a gas cooker and a gas fire.We have two gardens, one at the front and one at the back.Both gardens are small. Our street is noisy because they own motor bikes next door but one,so our street is very noisy at night.I can't get to sleep at night with them bombing up and down.
Tracey Jones Aged 9.
